spamclustering.mboxReader package¶

Submodules¶

spamclustering.mboxReader.mboxToEml module¶

spamclustering.mboxReader.mboxToEml.generateEmlFileName(message)¶

Generate a file name from a given message

Parameters:

message (email.message.Message) – Message to process

Returns:

File name generated form the email.

Return type:

str

spamclustering.mboxReader.mboxToEml.generateMailId(message)¶

Generates an ID for use in the files name.

Parameters:

message (email.message.Message) – Message to generate the ID from.

Returns:

ID generated from the mail.

Return type:

str

spamclustering.mboxReader.mboxToEml.processMbox(inPath, outPath)¶

Read the input of an MBox file and extract it. Write the extracted E-Mails to the given path.

Parameters:

  • inPath (str) – Path of the MBox file to extract.

  • outPath (str) – Path to write the extracted E-Mails to.
